verses.name: Romans 11:15
verses.text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world, what shall the receiving of them be, but life from the dead?

verses.name: Romans 11:16
verses.text: For if the firstfruit be holy, the lump is also holy: and if the root be holy, so are the branches.

verses.name: Romans 11:17
verses.text: And if some of the branches be broken off, and thou, being a wild olive tree, wert graffed in among them, and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree;

verses.name: Romans 11:18
verses.text: Boast not against the branches. But if thou boast, thou bearest not the root, but the root thee.
